author: trent_vanepps
content:

or is it scattered throughout this: https://notes.ethereum.org/@vbuterin/rkhCgQteN?type=view#Serenity-Design-Rationale

author: djrtwo
content:
PSA: the most up-to-date network spec is currently in the `v08x` branch to be released this week into `master`
Please see here if you are working on sync and other network related things -- https://github.com/ethereum/eth2.0-specs/blob/v08x/specs/networking/p2p-interface.md
